name: The Dinosaur Scientist (2022 Team 9)
description:
You are a dinosaur with a passion for astronomy and have been working on building a rocket to explore space. One night while star-gazing, you notice that an asteroid is hurtling towards Earth. You are sure that this asteroid will cause the end of the world, so you hurry to alert others so that the city’s forcefield gets activated to protect the planet from being destroyed. However, no one believes you and you are locked up in jail for being “crazy”. Now, in a race against time, you must find a way to escape from jail and save yourself from Earth’s impending doom. 

           

Controls:  

 A and D to move left and right

Space to jump

ESC to quit mid-game

          

Players have 10 minutes to escape from jail and save the world. Gameplay includes stealth, puzzles, and collection.
